text: Tagra na'ane huta Ra Anumzamoka kasegea ete rutagreta megi'a vahe'ma haviza huno agoterfa avu'avazama nehaza vahetera mofavre nagatia zamatre'sanunke'za vea erige, ara erige hugahaze? Tagra antahi'none anama hanunkenka'a, Kagra karimpa ahenerantenka ana maka tahe fanane hananketa magore huta omanigahune.
